vocabInfos.mediumDef:
A man living at the time of Exile and Return, only mentioned at Ezr.2.55; also called Perida at Neh.7.57;
§ Peruda or Perida = "grain" or "kernel"
an ancestor of a family of temple slaves who returned from exile with Zerubbabel
vocabInfos._es_Definition: jefe de familia; sirvientes de Salomón; post exílico
vocabInfos._zh_tw_Definition:
比路大 这个陽性專有名詞在希伯來文的意思是 "穀類" 或 "核仁"
與所羅巴伯歸回的殿役 (拉 2:55; 尼 7:57)
vocabInfos._zh_Definition:
比路大 这个阳性专有名词在希伯来文的意思是 "谷类" 或 "核仁"
与所罗巴伯归回的殿役 (拉 2:55; 尼 7:57)
